mapper.insert: insert into seattable (tableNum, tableLoc, tableColor, tableCatNum, tableName) values(#{tableNum},#{tableLoc},#{tableColor},#{tableCatNum},#{tableName})
mapper.select: select tableNum, tableLoc, tableColor, tableCatNum, tableName from seattable Where tableNum=#{tableNum}
select tableNum, tableLoc, tableColor, tableCatNum, tableName from seattable where tableNum > 0 order by tableNum desc
